InstructionData.Title: Gas - Ice melter
InstructionData.Author: Guarbones
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Melts ice using a furnace's "activate" function # This lets you melt ice at night on Mars, Moon, # even works on Europa
# === BUILD INSTRUCTIONS =========================== # Furnace # Housing for IC # Connect Furnace out pipe to your gas system # Connect a bunch of chutes to the furnace # Ice will never melt in chutes, so chutes are a # safe way to queue work for the ice melter.
# === DEVICES ====================================== alias dFurnace d0
# === PROGRAM ====================================== bMainLoop: dFurnace Activate 1
sleep 1 j bMainLoop
